title: Falling Transport Stocks Challenge Economic Outlook
sub_head: Dow Jones Transportation Average has fallen further than S&P 500 in recent weeks
body:
Transportation stocks have fallen sharply recently, with investorsâ€™ fears of an economic slowdown ramping up.
Shares of companies tied to trains, planes, boats and trucks, considered by many investors to be bellwether stocks, historically decline when lower demand for goods, materials and travel is expected, which translates to a weakening economic outlook.
